mapper.select: SELECT paper.Paper_title, paper.Paper_researchOne, paper.Paper_researchTwo, paper.Paper_researchThree, blindjudgegroup.Stu_id FROM paper, blindjudgegroup WHERE blindjudgegroup.Stu_id = paper.Paper_stuId
SELECT blindjudgegroup.Teacher_Grade, blindjudgegroup.Teacher_Result, blindjudgegroup.Teacher_description FROM teacher, blindjudgegroup WHERE blindjudgegroup.Teacher_id = teacher.Teacher_id
